name: Spirling Down
description:
Have you ever wanted to try pills?

Don't worry we have all been there...hopefully.

So I created this game called Spirling Down as a way to experience pills. But there is a twist. These aren't your typical illegal pills. Instead these are pills that are not  available in real life or a recreation of illegal drugs. 

However you will get different experiences depending on the pill you take...  They are chosen for you, so sorry for that.

Each experience is made out of my thoughts and use my own pictures that I have collected over the years.  

The sounds you hear in the game are mostly made by me but some are royalty free sounds.

- Try clicking on things like words or pics in the game.  

-  Try taking your time to hear the beautiful sounds I used.
